description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. AVATOUR - Liberty Update. Tour the Statue of Liberty with Your Avatar.  Use 4D Power to pass thru solid objects.  Use anti-gravity power to travel up or down.  Also, Drive a Taxi, Helicopter, Jet or Ferry Boat.                                GAMES.ARCHOR.COM
